mapper.select:
select
count(*) as trait_count
a.ga_id,a.trait_id,a.genotype_id,(select trait_name from trait where trait.trait_id=a.trait_id) as trait_name,a.rval,a.p_value,b.var_id,b.chrom,b.start_pos,b.end_pos,(select study_acc from study where study.study_id=a.study_id) as study_acc, (select pmid from publication where publication.paper_id=a.paper_id) as pmid,(select common_name from organism where organism.org_id=a.org_id) as common_name, (select version from organism where organism.org_id=a.org_id) as version
from genotype b inner join gwas_association a on a.genotype_id=b.genotype_id where b.genotype_id in (select genotype_id from genotype_annotate_gene where g_id=#{gId})

select
count(distinct b.trait_id) as trait_count
distinct b.trait_id,b.trait_name
from trait b inner join gwas_association a on a.trait_id=b.trait_id where 1=1
and b.trait_name like CONCAT('%',#{searchParam},'%')
and a.org_id=#{species}
limit ${p1},${p2}

select count(*) as gwas_count from gwas_association where trait_id=#{traitId}
and org_id=#{species}
select count(*) as gwas_count from gwas_association where paper_id=#{paperId}
select count(*) as gwas_count from gwas_association where study_id=#{studyId}

select count(distinct study_id) as gwas_count from gwas_association where trait_id=#{traitId}
and org_id=#{species}
